# makeResourceStateCommandEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Creates a resource state command encoder that uses default settings.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeResourceStateCommandEncoder() -> (any MTLResourceStateCommandEncoder)?
```

## Discussion

Use an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResourceStateCommandEncoder] instance’s methods to create a pass that updates the state of one or more sparse textures.

## Creating resource state encoders

- **resourceStateCommandEncoder(with:)**: Creates a resource state command encoder from a descriptor.
